name: Hey,
description:
Hey, is a game about making decisions that will change the outcome of a conversation. This game took around a total of 4 days to complete, and was a great learning experience! I hope you like what I've made!

In hey, there are currently 3 different conversations you can have with people. This is covered in the games tutorial... But whenever prompted with text that You can press A or D on your keyboard (or the buttons if you are on a mobile phone) to change what you are going to say in that sentence. Pretty cool right?
